Detailed Description

Distribution of values

Such object allows to compute the distribution of values with respect to a partition of the real domain.

Default constructor

Util::DistributionStatistic::DistributionStatistic ( ka_uint32_t  count_thresholds,
const double  thresholds[] 
)

Constructor Construct a DistributionStatistic object that counts number of inserted values each interval ] -oo, threshold[0] [, [ threshold[0],threshold[1] [, until [threshold[count_threshold], +oo[. The array of threshold is copied into the object.

Parameters:
count_thresholds [in] the number of thresholds in thresholds parameter
thresholds [in] the array of thresholds that defines intervals

ka_uint32_t Util::DistributionStatistic::distribution ( int  i  )  const [inline]

Return the number of values in interval [threshold[i-1], threshold[i][ The value of threshold[-1] is -oo, the value of threshold[size()] is +oo.

Parameters:
i [in] the index of the interval, 0 <= i <= size()
Return values:
return the number of value in [threshold[i-1], threshold[i][
